tcs.h1: General Terms and Conditions of Use

introduction.title: Preamble
introduction.p1: The present Terms and Conditions of Use (known as Â« T&Cs Â») define the conditions of access and use of the services by the Â« user Â».
introduction.p2: The present Terms and Conditions of Use are accessible on the website under the heading Â« Terms and Conditions of Use Â».
introduction.p3: Any registration or use of the site implies the acceptance without any reserve or restriction of these T&Cs by the user. When registering on the site via the registration form, each user expressly accepts these T&Cs by ticking the box before the following text : Â« I have read and accept the T&Cs Â».
introduction.p4: In case of non-acceptance of the T&Cs, the user must renounce access to the services offered by the website.
introduction.p5b: reserves the right to unilaterally modify at any time the content of these T&Cs.

3.p2a: Newsletters are automatically sent to subscribers. The sending frequency is set at once a month, however in particular case, an additional newsletter may be sent. The newsletter will be sent using the email address provided by the subscriber. The content of the newsletters is provided exclusively by Asking Franklin.

You can exercise this right by sending an email to

gtcs.h1: General Terms and Conditions of Sales

introduction.title: Preamble
introduction.p1: The present Terms and Conditions of Sales apply to all sales concluded on the website
introduction.p2b: is a service published by Sortvoices SAS and sells subscriptions to its SEO optimization software.
introduction.p3: The customer declares that he has read and accepted the Terms and Conditions of Sales before placing his order, and the validation of the order is worth accepted the Terms and Conditions of Sales.

1.p1: The term Â« service provider Â» refers to Sortvoices SAS.
1.p2: The term Â« customer Â» refers to the user who accesses the paid services of all or part of the services developed by Sortvoices SAS on the website
1.p3: The term Â« subscription Â» refers to the fact that a customer subscribes to the services offered on the website
1.p4: The term Â« order Â» refers to the fact that a customer subscribes to the services offered.
1.p5: The term Â« offer Â» refers to the solutions and services developed by Sortvoices SAS.
1.p6: The term Â« contract Â» refers to the relationship existing between the service provider and the customer once the latter has placed an order.

2.p1: The customer places his order online using the form on the website.
2.p2: To validate his subscription, the customer must accept, by clicking on the checkbox indicated on the website, these Terms and Conditions of Sales.
2.p3: Acceptance of these Terms and Conditions of Sales will result in an email of subscription confirmation from the service provider.
2.p4: All subscriptions constitute acceptance of the prices and descriptions of the offers.
2.p5: Payment is made by credit card, the subscription will be charged each month or each year, depending on the offer, in accordance with these Terms and Conditions of Sales.
2.p6: The subscription is concluded for a minimum of one month or twelve months, depending on the offer selected.
2.p7: For any question relating to the subscription, the customer may contact us with the email address

3.p1: The online provision of the customer's credit card numbers and the final validation of the order shall be proof of the customer's agreement.
3.p2: This will enable the service provider to obtain payment of the amounts due under the subscription and shall be deemed to be the signature and express acceptance of all operations carried out.

4.p1: The contractual information will be confirmed by email to the email address used by the buyer when placing the order.

5.p1a: The offer is fixed by these Terms and Conditions of Sales. The subscriptionis monthly for the monthly offer or annual for the annual offer and is subject to automatic renewal. the customer may, with the email address
5.p1b: , request to cancel his subscription. He may also, from his account profile, cancel the automatic renewal of his subscription in the dedicated section by unchecking the checkbox and then clicking on save.
5.p2: Cancellation will take effect at the end of the validity period of the current month or twelve months (based on the date the order was placed).
5.p3: Any month commenced is due in full.
5.p4: In case of termination of the subscription, Sortvoices commits to erase and delete from its system the data belonging to the customer, or to give back the data in text file format, by sending an email within 15 working days, depending on the customer's request. In the event that no express request from the customer is made on the date of termination, Sortvoices commits to delete the data at the end of a period of 15 days from that date.

6.p1: The prices are fixed by the present Terms and Conditions of Sales.

6.p2b: per month and will be charged each month by automatic renewal.

6.p3b: per month and will be paid in one installment by credit card, i.e.
6.p3c: , when ordering. It will then be debited each year by automatic renewal.

6.p5: The service provider reserves itself the right to change its prices at any time, but commits to apply the rates in force at the time of the order.
6.p6: If one or more taxes or contributions are created or modified, whether upwards or downwards, this change may be passed on to the sale price of the products.

11.p2: The customer has the right to access, modify, rectify and delete data concerning him (art. 34 of the Â« informatique et libertÃ©s Â» law). Data belonging to the customer managed by Sortvoices are and remain the property of the customer. Sortvoices commits to keep this data confidential.

12.p1: The personal data collected on this website are the following :
12.p2: Account opening : when the customer's account is created, his surname, first name, email address, phone number, postal address.
12.p3a: Login : when the user connects to the website

12.p6: The personal data collected from users is used to provide the website's services, to improve them and to maintain a secure environment. More specifically, the uses are as follows :

ul1.1a: Access and use of the website
ul1.2: Operation management and optimization of the website

ul1.4: Verification, identification and authentication of the data transmittedby the user
ul1.5: Possible disputes management with the customers.

12.p7: If the customer has given his consent during his registration, his personal information may also be used to create a file for commercial prospecting purposes.
12.p8: Personal data may be shared with third party companies in the following cases :

ul2.1: When the customer uses the payment services, the service provider is in contact with third party banking and financial companies with which it has concluded contracts for the implementation of these services
ul2.2: If required by law, the service provider may carry out the transmission of data in order to pursue claims against Sortvoices SAS and to comply with administrative and legal procedures
ul2.3: If the service provider is involved in a merger, acquisition, disposal of assets or receivership proceedings, it may be required to sell or share all or part of its assets, including personal data. In this case, the customers would be informed before personal data is transferred to a third party.
